DescriptionData.Title: AJs 17" Solid Colored Arm Warmers
DescriptionData.Description: These arm warmers are perfect for teams or any dance group that needs an easy uniform accessory. They are also a nice fashion statement for anyone, and will keep you warm. They are stretchy enough to be comfortable, but have enough elastic in them to keep them in place. These Arm warmers are made from 91% acrylic and 9% elastic.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: 16 inches long, can be worn as an Arm Warmer or a small Leg Warmer
